titles.title: Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993
A bill to terminate the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13844-13845)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 10/18/1993--Introduced. Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993 - Terminates the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences.
